```{r echo = F}
library(shiny)
shiny::shinyApp(
  
  ui = fluidPage(
    uiOutput("vector_basic_math_title"),
    
    fluidRow(
      
      column(width = 12,
             imageOutput("vector_basic_gif")
             
      )
    )
  ),
  
  server = function(input, output) {
    output$vector_basic_math_title <- renderUI(
      
      
      h2(withMathJax(
        "$$\\vec{v} \\text{ is the vector addition of the scaled basis vectors: }\\hat{i} \\text{,} \\hat{j}$$"
      ))
    )
    
    output$vector_basic_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"vector_basic.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)

)


```

### Systems of Equations
```{r echo = F}

shiny::shinyApp(
  
  ui = fluidPage(
    fluidRow(
      column(
        width = 12,
        uiOutput("math_systems_intro")
      )
      
      
    ),
    fluidRow(
      
      column(width = 12,
             imageOutput("systems_gif"),
             imageOutput("systems_inverse_gif")
             
      )
    ),
    br(),
    br(),
    br(),
    br(),
    fluidRow(
      column(width = 6,
             uiOutput("math_systems_det_span"),
             h3("show inverse A gif here")
      )
    ),
    fluidRow(
      column(width = 4,
             imageOutput("systems_determinant_span_gif")
      ),
      column(width = 8,
             uiOutput("math_systems_det_A")
      )
    ),
    br(),
    br(),
    br(),
    br(),
    br(),
    fluidRow(
      column(width = 4,
             imageOutput("systems_det_solutions_gif")
      ),
      column(width = 8,
             uiOutput("math_systems_det_A2"),
             h3("can't use inverse A because one point would go to multiple vectors")
      )
    )
    
    
    
  ),
  
  server = function(input, output) {

    output$math_systems_intro <- renderUI(
      h3(withMathJax(
        "$$\\text{For a system of equations}$$ 
               $$\\begin{align}
               -3x_1 + 2x_2 & = -4   \\\\
               2x_1 - 2x_2 & = 2
               \\end{align}
               $$
               $$\\begin{align}
               A\\vec{x} & = \\vec{b}  \\\\
               \\begin{bmatrix} -3  & 2 \\\\ 2  & -2 \\end{bmatrix}
               \\begin{bmatrix} x_1  \\\\ x_2   \\end{bmatrix} &= \\begin{bmatrix} -4  \\\\ 2   \\end{bmatrix}
               \\end{align} $$
               $$$$
               $$\\text{The solution to the equation is the vector which after a transformation given by }A\\text{, lands on }\\begin{bmatrix} -4  \\\\ 2   \\end{bmatrix} $$
               "
      ))
    )
        output$math_systems_det_span <- renderUI(
      h3(withMathJax(
        "$$ \\text{Notice that for a transformation matrix }A\\text{ whose determinant } = 0\\text{, the spanned vectors collapse onto a line}$$"
      ))
    )
        
                output$math_systems_det_A <- renderUI(
      h3(withMathJax(
        "$$A =  \\begin{bmatrix} 1  & -2 \\\\ 2  & -4 \\end{bmatrix} $$ 
               $$$$
               
               $$\\begin{align}\\begin{vmatrix}A\\end{vmatrix} &= (1 * -4) - (2 * -2) \\\\
               & = 0
               \\end{align}$$
               $$$$
               $$\\text{If }A \\text{ were part of a system of equations } A\\vec{x} = \\vec{b}  \\text{,}$$$$\\text{then the system only has a solution if }\\vec{b} \\text{ lies
               on the spanned line}$$"
      ))
    )
    
      output$systems_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"systems.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)

      output$systems_inverse_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"systems_inverse.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)
      output$systems_determinant_span_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"systems_det_span.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)

            output$systems_det_solutions_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"systems_det_solutions.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)

    
    
  },
  
  options = list(height = 600)
)


```

### EigenVectors
```{r echo = F}

shiny::shinyApp(
  
  ui = fluidPage(
      fluidRow(
        column(
          width = 12,
          h2("Eigenvectors are special vectors that only scale under a transformation")
        )
      ),
      fluidRow(
        column(
          width = 12,
          uiOutput("math_eigen_intro")
        )
      ),
      
      fluidRow(
        
        column(width = 12,
               imageOutput("eigen_gif")

        )
      ),
      br(),
      br(),
      br(),
      br(),
      br(),
      fluidRow(
        
        column(width = 12,
               imageOutput("eigen_lambda_gif")
               
        )
      )
    
    
  ),
  
  server = function(input, output) {
    
    output$tmath_eigen_intro<- renderUI(
      h2(withMathJax(
        "$$
                A =  \\begin{bmatrix} 1  & 1 \\\\ 2  & 3 \\end{bmatrix}
               $$
               $$
                v_1 = \\begin{bmatrix} -0.344  \\\\ -0.939  \\end{bmatrix} ; \\lambda_1 = 3.73
               $$
               $$
                v_2 = \\begin{bmatrix} -0.807  \\\\ 0.591  \\end{bmatrix} ; \\lambda_2 = 0.27
               $$"
      ))
    )
    
      output$eigen_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"eigen_gif.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)
      output$eigen_lambda_gif <- renderImage({list(src = paste0(path_to_gifs,"eigen_lambda_gif.gif"),contentType = 'image/gif')},deleteFile = F)

    
    
  },
  
  options = list(height = 600)
)


```
